title: France panorama. [No. 70/47]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Charles de Gaulle - after General de Gaulle’s death. 2. Wings - the “Puma” SA-330, a new French helicopter. 3. Space - a moonstone from the Apollo 12 flight and a new “spaceroom” in Paris. 4. The arts - Fernand Leger’s Normandy farmhouse becomes a museum.
